message.body: Hi Julia, I'm thinking of leaving our farm around 6 am on Saturday to get your horse so we can get back and still have some of the day, whaddaya think? :)
Works for me! I'll check with seller & barn and let you know if that won't work. Thanks!
Also, have you talked to Caitlin? What are you're plans re Louie?
I just texted her - hopefully I can ride him some the next couple weeks & then stop leasing for next month.
